description: go-tour: Rearranging slides to have a more natural flow.

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/

https://codereview.appspot.com/7275043/diff/3001/tour.article
File tour.article (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7275043/diff/3001/tour.article#newcode298
tour.article:298: * Arrays
delete

The content of the tour should always be a tour people will use. Don't include visible todos.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7275043/diff/3001/tour.article#newcode300
tour.article:300: TODO(campoy)
# TODO(campoy): Arrays section

https://codereview.appspot.com/7275043/diff/3001/tour.article#newcode355
tour.article:355: * Appending to slices
ditto

https://codereview.appspot.com/7275043/diff/3001/tour.article#newcode429
tour.article:429: * Range on maps
Ditto

https://codereview.appspot.com/7275043/diff/3001/tour.article#newcode498
tour.article:498: * Exercise: Switch statement
Ditto

Do you actually have these written? Ready to go for the next CL? If not, I would prefer not to add a bunch of speculative TODOs.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7275043/diff/3001/tour.article#newcode671
tour.article:671: 
revert

PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/7275043/diff/3001/tour.article

Done.
